content.question: The perspective of the author in the first paragraph can best be understood in the context of which of the following nineteenth-century developments?

choices.label: The expansion of Catholicism in Africa and the Americas
The development of new military technologies due to industrialization
Competition among European states for global power and influence

content.answer: Competition among European states for global power and influence

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
